description:
OpenAI has announced the release of fine-tuning capabilities for its GPT-4o model, a feature eagerly awaited by developers. To sweeten the deal, OpenAI is providing one million free training tokens per day for every organisation until 23rd September. Tailoring GPT-4o using custom datasets can result in enhanced performance and reduced costs for specific applications. Fine-tuning... Read more »

The post OpenAI delivers GPT-4o fine-tuning appeared first on AI News.
title: OpenAI delivers GPT-4o fine-tuning
